name: Astro (itch) (Its Your Boi Nova)
description:
Astro is a precision platformer where you are a cybernetically enhanced young man trying to make your way out of the undercity and to find out how he came to be.

TheDemo:

This demo's primary focus is on fluid movement and challenging platforming with a variety of obstacles to overcome and a variety of movement skills to help you get through them.

TheMoveset:

  • 8Directional Dash: Inspired by celeste yet used in various interesting ways.
  • Sliding: A quick way to get yourself underneath any sort of trouble.
  • GroundPound: To quickly stick the landing and maybe even break it.
  • LongJumps: When jumping too high might be your end.

TheObstacles:

  • Spikes
  • SpinningSaws
  • LaserBeams

And much much more.

COMINGS SOON TO  KICKSTARTER:
